update con_contract

LESSOR_IDS = #{record.lessorIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LESSOR_IDS_OTHER = #{record.lessorIdsOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

c.ID, c.HID, c.NO, c.STATUS, c.RENTAL_MODE, c.LEASE_PURPOSE, c.LEASE_DOMAIN, c.LEASE_AREA, c.LEASE_TERM_YEAR, c.LEASE_TERM_MONTH, c.START_TIME, c.LESSEE_PID, c.LESSEE_NAME, c.LESSEE_ID_TYPE, c.LESSEE_ID_NO, c.LESSEE_MOBILE, c.MONTHLY_RENT, c.SETTLEMENT_CYCLE, c.OWNER_BEAR, c.OWNER_BEAR_OTHER, c.DEPOSIT_AMT, c.PAYMENT_METHOD, c.LESSOR_PID, c.LESSOR_NAME, c.LESSOR_ID_TYPE, c.LESSOR_ID_NO, c.LESSOR_MOBILE, c.HOUSE_ADDR, c.PROPERTY_TYPE, c.HOUSE_TYPE, c.BUILDING_AREA, c.HOUSE_OWNER_PID, c.HOUSE_OWNER_NAME, c.HOUSE_OWNER_ID_TYPE, c.HOUSE_OWNER_ID_NO, c.HOUSE_OWNER_MOBILE, c.REJECT_REASON_TYPE, c.REJECT_REASON, c.EID, c.CONFIRM_TIME, c.RENEWAL_FLG, c.AGENT_STATUS, c.CREATE_USER, c.CREATE_TIME, c.MODIFY_USER, c.MODIFY_TIME, c.DELETE_FLG, c.VERSION
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(LEASE_AREA)
FROM CON_CONTRACT WHERE HID=#{hid} AND STATUS IN (5,9,10,13) AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND
( (START_TIME<=#{startTime} AND END_TIME>=#{endTime}) OR (END_TIME>=#{startTime} AND END_TIME<=#{endTime}) OR (START_TIME>=#{startTime} AND START_TIME<=#{endTime}) )
AND ID != #{id}
mapper.sql: ID, PINDEX, HID, AGENT_STATUS, NO, STATUS, RENTAL_MODE, STAGES, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = RENTAL_MODE) RENTAL_MODE_NAME, LEASE_PURPOSE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_purpose' AND CODE = LEASE_PURPOSE) RENTAL_PURPOSE_NAME, LEASE_DOMAIN, LEASE_AREA, LEASE_TERM_YEAR, LEASE_TERM_MONTH, START_TIME, END_TIME, LESSEE_PID, LESSEE_NAME, LESSEE_ID_TYPE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'per_id_type' AND CODE = LESSEE_ID_TYPE) LESSEE_ID_TYPE_NAME, LESSEE_ID_NO, LESSEE_MOBILE, MONTHLY_RENT, SETTLEMENT_CYCLE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'settlement_cycle' AND CODE = SETTLEMENT_CYCLE) SETTLEMENT_CYCLE_NAME, PAY_TIME_MONTH, PAY_TIME_DAY, OWNER_BEAR, OWNER_BEAR_OTHER, DEPOSIT_AMT, PAYMENT_METHOD, LESSOR_PID, LESSOR_NAME, LESSOR_ID_TYPE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'per_id_type' AND CODE = LESSOR_ID_TYPE) LESSOR_ID_TYPE_NAME, LESSOR_ID_NO, LESSOR_MOBILE, HOUSE_ADDR, PROPERTY_TYPE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'property_id_type' AND CODE = PROPERTY_TYPE) PROPERTY_ID_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'house_type' AND CODE = HOUSE_TYPE) HOUSE_TYPE_NAME, HOUSE_TYPE, BUILDING_AREA, HOUSE_OWNER_PID, HOUSE_OWNER_NAME, HOUSE_OWNER_ID_TYPE, HOUSE_OWNER_ID_NO, HOUSE_OWNER_MOBILE, REJECT_REASON, REJECT_REASON_TYPE, CONFIRM_TIME, PAY_DEPOSIT_TIME, DISS_AGR_TIME, SEND_TIME, APPROVAL_TIME, DEPOSIT_CLAIM_TIME, CANCEL_TIME, FINISH_TIME, REJECT_TIME, APPROVE_REJECT_TIME, RENEWAL_FLG, RENEWAL_CID, PROXY_NAME, PROXY_CARD_TYPE, PROXY_CARD_NO, PROXY_ATT_ID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLG, VERSION, HAS_INSURANCE, AGENCY_FEE, ADDITIONAL_TERMS, EID, BEID,SOURCE,LESSEE_ADDRESS,LESSEE_EMAIL,LESSEE_BACKUP_TEL,LESSEE_BACKUP_NAME, LESSOR_ADDRESS,LESSOR_EMAIL,LESSOR_BACKUP_NAME,LESSOR_BACKUP_TEL,LESSEE_IDS,LESSEE_IDS_OTHER,LESSOR_IDS,LESSOR_IDS_OTHER
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM (SELECT
, CASE WHEN ISNULL(c.DISS_AGR_TIME) THEN END_TIME ELSE c.DISS_AGR_TIME END AS END_TIME FROM CON_CONTRACT c
LEFT JOIN agt_emp_info e ON c.BEID = e.ID INNER JOIN sys_person p ON p.ID = e.PID
WHERE 1=1 AND c.DELETE_FLG = 0
AND c.BEID IN (${scope})
AND c.BEID = #{beid}
AND c.STATUS = #{status}
AND (c.LESSEE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInfo},'%') OR c.LESSOR_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInfo},'%') OR p.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInfo},'%')) OR c.`NO` LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{searchInfo}, '%')
AND c.ID NOT IN (SELECT DEL_ID FROM USR_DEL_INFO WHERE UEP_ID = #{uid}) AND ((c.SOURCE = 2) OR (c.SOURCE != 2 AND c.STATUS IN (4,5,6,7,8))) ) C
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY c.START_TIME DESC
mapper.sql: C.ID, C.HID, C.NO, C.STATUS, C.RENTAL_MODE, C.LEASE_PURPOSE, C.LEASE_DOMAIN, C.LEASE_AREA, C.LEASE_TERM_YEAR, C.LEASE_TERM_MONTH, C.START_TIME, C.END_TIME, C.LESSEE_PID, C.LESSEE_NAME, C.LESSEE_ID_TYPE, C.LESSEE_ID_NO, C.LESSEE_MOBILE, C.MONTHLY_RENT, C.SETTLEMENT_CYCLE, C.PAY_TIME_MONTH, C.PAY_TIME_DAY, C.OWNER_BEAR, C.OWNER_BEAR_OTHER, C.DEPOSIT_AMT, C.PAYMENT_METHOD, C.LESSOR_PID, C.LESSOR_NAME, C.LESSOR_ID_TYPE, C.LESSOR_ID_NO, C.LESSOR_MOBILE, C.HOUSE_ADDR, C.PROPERTY_TYPE, C.HOUSE_TYPE, C.BUILDING_AREA, C.HOUSE_OWNER_PID, C.HOUSE_OWNER_NAME, C.HOUSE_OWNER_ID_TYPE, C.HOUSE_OWNER_ID_NO, C.HOUSE_OWNER_MOBILE, C.REJECT_REASON_TYPE, C.REJECT_REASON, C.AGENT_STATUS, C.SEND_TIME, C.CONFIRM_TIME, C.REJECT_TIME, C.PAY_DEPOSIT_TIME, C.FINISH_TIME, C.DISS_AGR_TIME, C.APPROVE_REJECT_TIME, C.APPROVAL_TIME, C.DEPOSIT_CLAIM_TIME, C.CANCEL_TIME, C.RENEWAL_FLG, C.RENEWAL_CID, C.CREATE_USER, C.CREATE_TIME, C.MODIFY_USER, C.MODIFY_TIME, C.DELETE_FLG, C.VERSION, C.EID, C.HAS_INSURANCE
mapper.select: SELECT S.NAME AS SNAME, E.NAME AS CNAME, A.PHONE AS PHONE, , (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'settlement_cycle' AND CODE = C.SETTLEMENT_CYCLE) SETTLEMENT_CYCLE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'per_id_type' AND CODE = C.LESSEE_ID_TYPE) LESSEE_ID_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'per_id_type' AND CODE = C.LESSOR_ID_TYPE) LESSOR_ID_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = C.RENTAL_MODE) RENTAL_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_purpose' AND CODE = C.LEASE_PURPOSE) LEASE_PURPOSE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'payment_method' AND CODE = C.PAYMENT_METHOD) PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'con_reject_reason' AND CODE = C.REJECT_REASON_TYPE) REJECT_REASON_TYPE_NAME FROM CON_CONTRACT C LEFT JOIN AGT_EMP_INFO A ON C.EID = A.ID LEFT JOIN AGT_COMP_INFO E ON A.COMPANY_ID = E.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON S ON A.PID = S.ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CON_CONTRACT
HID = #{hid},
STATUS = #{status},
REJECT_TIME = SYSDATE(),
CONFIRM_TIME = SYSDATE(),
PAY_DEPOSIT_TIME = SYSDATE(),
FINISH_TIME = SYSDATE(),
SEND_TIME = SYSDATE(),
APPROVE_REJECT_TIME = SYSDATE(),
CANCEL_TIME = SYSDATE(),
DEPOSIT_CLAIM_TIME = SYSDATE(),
RENTAL_MODE = #{rentalMode},
LEASE_PURPOSE = #{leasePurpose},
LEASE_DOMAIN = #{leaseDomain},
LEASE_AREA = #{leaseArea},
LEASE_TERM_YEAR = #{leaseTermYear},
LEASE_TERM_MONTH = #{leaseTermMonth},
START_TIME = #{startTime},
END_TIME = #{endTime},
LESSEE_PID = #{lesseePid},
LESSEE_NAME = #{lesseeName},
LESSEE_ID_TYPE = #{lesseeIdType},
LESSEE_ID_NO = #{lesseeIdNo},
LESSEE_MOBILE = #{lesseeMobile},
MONTHLY_RENT = #{monthlyRent},
SETTLEMENT_CYCLE = #{settlementCycle},
PAY_TIME_MONTH = #{payTimeMonth},
PAY_TIME_DAY = #{payTimeDay},
OWNER_BEAR = #{ownerBear},
OWNER_BEAR_OTHER = #{ownerBearOther},
DEPOSIT_AMT = #{depositAmt},
PAYMENT_METHOD = #{paymentMethod},
LESSOR_PID = #{lessorPid},
LESSOR_NAME = #{lessorName},
LESSOR_ID_TYPE = #{lessorIdType},
LESSOR_ID_NO = #{lessorIdNo},
LESSOR_MOBILE = #{lessorMobile},
HOUSE_ADDR = #{houseAddr},
PROPERTY_TYPE = #{propertyType},
HOUSE_TYPE = #{houseType},
BUILDING_AREA = #{buildingArea},
HOUSE_OWNER_PID = #{houseOwnerPid},
HOUSE_OWNER_NAME = #{houseOwnerName},
HOUSE_OWNER_ID_TYPE = #{houseOwnerIdType},
HOUSE_OWNER_ID_NO = #{houseOwnerIdNo},
HOUSE_OWNER_MOBILE = #{houseOwnerMobile},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason},
REJECT_REASON_TYPE = #{rejectReasonType},
DISS_AGR_TIME = #{dissAgrTime},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime},
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime},
APPROVAL_TIME = #{approvalTime},
DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg},
RENEWAL_FLG = #{renewalFlg},
RENEWAL_CID = #{renewalCid},
MODIFY_USER = #{currUserId},
MODIFY_TIME = SYSDATE(), VERSION = VERSION + 1
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select END_TIME from con_contract WHERE HID = #{hid} AND STATUS IN (2,3,4,5,9,10) AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND RENTAL_MODE = 0
